attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people ask the government to change the prison term which involves crimes of rape, childhood abuse and murder of a child or baby. The prison term we request is the same as the victim life in prison. never let the people who hurt babies and children be able to come near another child ever again. 
 
We ask you to keep our streets and homes safe for our children. 
Change the law once a phaedophile. has committed a crime they are never released so they can re-offend.
look at the prison sentence of abusers and make them much longer so hopefully it will deter them from committing a crime against an innocent baby or child.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
